name: V_EHI_INV_FILTER
description: The view contains columns that provide EHI related filtering information for invoices.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID associated with this invoice.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: Stores the requisition grouper ID associated with the invoice.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number associated with the primary patient contact if available. Otherwise, the patient contact associated with the first transaction on the invoice.
